Html:
-          We are looking for article writers . We consistently need 10 to 20 UNIQUE articles daily between 300- 900 Words. Payment range between $2-10.

       Followings are the criteria:

-          - Articles must be checked ORIGINAL as it will be checked against copyscape before being paid.

-          - Articles should have no spelling, punctuation, or grammar errors.

-          - Topics varies: Writers  will be required to write articles on general topics, specific topics and news articles.

-          - Once purchase we will keep exclusive right on all articles.

  Contact editor@eshreya.com

Website: www.authorclub.info
